title: An Act to authorize the acquisition of land, the development and construction of an underground railroad, civil rights and black heritage museum and cultural center in Springfield

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Williams of Springfield, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3601) of Bud L. Williams for legislation to authorize the acquisition of land, the development and construction of an underground railroad, civil rights and black heritage museum and cultural center in the city of Springfield.  Tourism, Arts and Cultural Development.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Tourism, Arts and Cultural Development

related_entities.name: committee on Tourism, Arts and Cultural Development

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/21/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in B-2
Accompanied a new draft, see H4840
